name: 爱德华·W·莫雷
bio_short: 美国科学家（化学家和物理学家）。他最著名的成就是与迈克尔逊合作进行了“迈克尔逊-莫雷实验”（`michelson_morley_1887`），证明了以太不存在。他还精确测定了氧的原子量。
bio_short_en: An American scientist (chemist and physicist). He is best known for his collaboration with Michelson on the 'Michelson-Morley experiment' (`michelson_morley_1887`), proving the non-existence of the aether. He also precisely determined the atomic weight of oxygen.
